summary: Simple tweak for Arvaks Summon Spell.
descriptionHtml:
So, who else here pumped all their points into Health and Stamina only to find out that one of the coolest mounts introduced by Bethesda required 133mana to summon? 

Hands up.

Anyway, I have had Arvak for a while now and Im sick of looking at a spell I cant use. So Ive decided to change that.
Arvak is now summoned via a shout, no cooldown and he is summoned where your crosshair is within 25ft, much like the original, but with zero mana cost.

I hope it wont effect how you learn it, I dont think it will since its taught directly to you. Anyone who comes across a problem please let me know, other then that, enjoy!
author: Edg3
